Workflow.Name: SDI Web Scraping
Workflow.Definition:
"@@ConnectionString: ''
@@Type: 'Local'
@@DesktopType: 'local'
@@DisplayName: 'Local computer'
IMPORT 'controlRepo.appmask' AS appmask
IMPORT 'imageRepo.imgrepo' AS imgrepo
@SENSITIVE: []
**REGION Get CSV data
Excel.LaunchExcel.LaunchAndOpenUnderExistingProcess Path: $'''C:\\KamrulInfo\\Monir Bhai\\Project\\SDI\\SearchProject\\Category.xlsx''' Visible: True ReadOnly: False Instance=> ExcelInstancekeywords
Excel.ReadFromExcel.ReadCells Instance: ExcelInstancekeywords StartColumn: 2 StartRow: 2 EndColumn: 2 EndRow: 80 ReadAsText: False FirstLineIsHeader: True RangeValue=> ExcelData
Excel.CloseExcel.Close Instance: ExcelInstancekeywords
**ENDREGION
DISABLE File.ReadTextFromFile.ReadTextAsList File: $'''C:\\KamrulInfo\\Monir Bhai\\Project\\SDI\\SearchProject\\ListofkeywordsSearch.txt''' Encoding: File.TextFileEncoding.UTF8 Contents=> FileContents
**REGION Web Scrapping
LOOP FOREACH CurrentItem IN ExcelData
 SET CategoryPath TO $'''C:\\KamrulInfo\\Monir Bhai\\Project\\SDI\\SearchProject'''
 SET TargetedURL TO $'''https://www.sbir.gov/awards'''
 WebAutomation.LaunchChrome.LaunchChrome Url: TargetedURL WindowState: WebAutomation.BrowserWindowState.Maximized ClearCache: False ClearCookies: False WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60 Timeout: 60 PiPUserDataFolderMode: WebAutomation.PiPUserDataFolderModeEnum.AutomaticProfile TargetDesktop: $'''{\"DisplayName\":\"Local computer\",\"Route\":{\"ServerType\":\"Local\",\"ServerAddress\":\"\"}}''' BrowserInstance=> Browser
 WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextFieldUsePhysicalKeyboard BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://www.sbir.gov/awards\'']['Input text \'keywords\' 2'] Text: CurrentItem Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace UnfocusAfterPopulate: True WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Return}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
 WebAutomation.SetCheckboxState.SetCheckboxState BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://www.sbir.gov/awards\'']['Label \'2024\''] State: WebAutomation.CheckboxState.Checked WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://www.sbir.gov/awards\'']['Anchor \'Apply ðŸ—˜\''] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 WAIT 1
 WebAutomation.GetDetailsOfElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://www.sbir.gov/awards\'']['Span \'No Results ... and try again.\''] AttributeName: $'''Exists''' AttributeValue=> SearchValue
 DISABLE Display.ShowMessageDialog.ShowMessage Title: $'''element value''' Message: SearchValue Icon: Display.Icon.None Buttons: Display.Buttons.OK DefaultButton: Display.DefaultButton.Button1 IsTopMost: False ButtonPressed=> ButtonPressed
 IF Contains(SearchValue, $'''false''', False) THEN
 WebAutomation.Click.Click BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://www.sbir.gov/awards\'']['Anchor \'Persistently ... System (PEGASUS)\''] ClickType: WebAutomation.ClickType.LeftClick MouseClick: False WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60 MousePositionRelativeToElement: WebAutomation.RectangleEdgePoint.MiddleCenter OffsetX: 0 OffsetY: 0
 WebAutomation.ExtractData.ExtractTableInExcel BrowserInstance: Browser Control: $'''html > body > div > main > div:eq(6) > div > div > section:eq(1) > div > div''' ExtractionParameters: {[$'''div:eq(0) > a > h4''', $'''Own Text''', $'''''', $'''Value #1'''], [$'''div:eq(0) > address''', $'''Own Text''', $'''''', $'''Value #2'''], [$'''div:eq(1) > p:eq(0)''', $'''Own Text''', $'''''', $'''Value #3'''], [$'''div:eq(1) > p:eq(1)''', $'''Own Text''', $'''''', $'''Value #4'''] } PostProcessData: False TimeoutInSeconds: 60 ExcelInstance=> ExcelInstance
 DISABLE Excel.SaveExcel.Save Instance: ExcelInstance
 DISABLE Excel.CloseExcel.Close Instance: ExcelInstance
 DISABLE Text.AppendLine Text: FileContents LineToAppend: CurrentItem Result=> Result
 File.WriteText File: $'''C:\\KamrulInfo\\Monir Bhai\\Project\\SDI\\SearchProject\\ListofkeywordsSearch.txt''' TextToWrite: CurrentItem AppendNewLine: True IfFileExists: File.IfFileExists.Append Encoding: File.FileEncoding.Unicode
 END
 WebAutomation.CloseWebBrowser BrowserInstance: Browser
END
**REGION Data Extracting
Outlook.Launch Instance=> OutlookInstance
Outlook.SendEmailThroughOutlook.SendEmail Instance: OutlookInstance Account: $'''kamrul@CloudSoft365x24x7.onmicrosoft.com''' SendTo: $'''kamrul@CloudSoft365x24x7.onmicrosoft.com''' Subject: $'''Test Web data extracting - October 2024''' Body: $'''Hi Admin,
Here is Test Web data extracting - October 2024


Regards
System Admin''' IsBodyHtml: True IsDraft: False
Outlook.Close Instance: OutlookInstance
**ENDREGION
**ENDREGION
**REGION Close Browser
WebAutomation.CloseWebBrowser BrowserInstance: Browser
**ENDREGION
"
